ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Mob Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Might I remind everyone that there s a theory that high charisma makes you more hated by monsters.  Aside from bards, enchanters tend to have high charisma.
ygData.messageBody:
Might I remind everyone that there's a theory that high
charisma makes you more hated by monsters. Aside from bards,
enchanters tend to have high charisma.

On Wed, 7 Jul 1999, Jones, Brian wrote:
>
> If it happened in the room where there is a secret entrance to the mine, the
> same thing happened to our party (they targeted our enchanter though).

> > From: Brendan <brendan@...>
> >
> > > I was only affecting my group - these things came from out of NOWHERE -
> > why
> > > would this act like such a magnet?
> >
> > even worse, i was down in runnyeye over the weekend standing around
> > in a room waiting for some tougher monsters to spawn. I wasn't singing any
> > songs, and goblins that weren't in the same room would detect me and i'd
> > hear the "Half-elves like you have no place in our room". about 3 or 4
> > minutes later a horde of about 8 goblins would burst into the room and go
> > ape-shit on me.
> >
> > It's pretty unfair that goblins that couldn't see me would come after me
> > when i wasn't doing anything to them, especially since it wasn't happening
> > to anyone else in the room.
> >
> > -klamot, bard of fennin ro
